main.name: Pollinder
main.description: A Polictical Compass app for young adults. Participate in a swiping game to see where your political ideologies lie, view party views and promises, and see a live map of others results
main.bio: The app was built using a React front-end with Flask in the backend and firebase as our database, access out github repository through the link below.
